text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Watanabe was born in Hiroshima on September 24, 1924. After graduating from Kokugakuin University, he played for Chugoku Electric Power. In March 1954, Watanabe was selected the Japan national team for 1954 World Cup qualification. At this qualification, on March 14, he debuted against South Korea. He also played at 1954 Asian Games. He played 2 games for Japan in 1954. On October 12, 2011, Watanabe died of pancreatic cancer in Hiroshima at the age of 87. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1954||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Footballers from Hiroshima Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers
